TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabelsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel>
Public Class CustomLabelsCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of CustomLabel)

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示对象的集合 ，这些对象表示 对象可使用的自定义标签。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the custom labels that an object can use. 此类作为 对象的集合属性公开 。This class is exposed as the collection property of an object. > [!NOTE] > 您可以 使用 包含参数的任何方法定义，使用自定义标签自动填充轴的整个标签行 `DateTimeIntervalType` 。You can automatically populate the entire label row of an axis with custom labels using any method definition that includes a `DateTimeIntervalType` argument. 属性指示集合中的总项数，通常用于查找集合的上限。The property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

summary.span: 将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

param.span: 一个 ，确定自定义标签的绘制频率。

span.span: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the interval type.

summary.span: 将多个 类型的 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds multiple objects of type to the collection.

summary.span: 使用标签填充轴的整个第一行。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 为轴的整个第一个标签行创建和初始化对象，该标签具有 指定类型的标签。The method creates and initializes objects for the entire first label row of an axis with labels of the specified type. `labelsStep`参数确定自定义标签的绘制频率。The `labelsStep` parameter determines how often the custom labels will be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 调用此特定方法定义之前，必须先调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

The newly added object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向相关轴的第一个标签行添加一个自定义标签。Adds one custom label to the first label row of the relevant axis. 不使用标签标记。No label mark is used. 如果在第一个标签行中的任何位置使用自定义标签，则不会为该行自动生成标签。If a custom label is used anywhere in the first label row, no labels are automatically generated for that first row. > [!NOTE] > 调用此特定方法定义之前，必须先调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 为轴的具有指定类型的第一个标签行创建和初始化对象 。This method creates and initializes objects for an axis' entire first label row with labels of the specified type. 步骤确定自定义标签的绘制频率，还可以指定可选的标签格式。The step determines how often the custom labels will be drawn, and optional label formatting can be specified as well. > [!NOTE] > 调用此特定方法定义之前，必须先调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.
